author: Reuters
title: Coronavirus impact spreads across U.S., with much of the population under stay-at-home orders
description: The strain of the fast-spreading coronavirus outbreak accelerated across the United States on Wednesday beyond the hot spots of New York, California and Washington state as Louisiana and Iowa were declared federal disaster areas.
content:
